Detailed Description

template<typename CharType = char>
struct ASCII< CharType >

ASCII encoding.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ASCII

Template Parameters
CharTypeCode unit for storing 7-bit ASCII data. Default is char.
Note
implements Encoding concept
